intro.Rmd

First we will load the necessary packages.

#devtools::install_github("jameslairdsmith/scheduler")
library(scheduler)
library(lubridate)
#> 
#> Attaching package: 'lubridate'
#> The following object is masked from 'package:base':
#> 
#>     date
in_month("Jan")

#> {
#>     .f(date, ...) == x
#> }
